Justice for the 96, Justice for the Hong Kong People

We are a group of LFC Supporters from Hong Kong. We are urgently seeking help from everyone of you on the current situation in Hong Kong. Hong Kong people is currently suffering from World’s worst humanitarian crises. In the recent weeks, the Anti-Extradition Bill movement has evolved into illegal and bloody suppression responsible by the cooperation of Communist government, Chinese Armed Police, Hong Kong Police Force and triads. Thousands of citizens were brutally attacked with tremendous evidences and their basic human rights were casually deprived.

The Hong Kong LFC supporters live the values of the football club. In the Hillsborough Disaster, 96 precious lives of our brothers were deprived because of the mass crime of the police. We have continuously shown our support to the JFT96 movement as you could see during the team visit to Hong Kong in 2003, 2007, 2017 and in the normal days. You should be fury to understand that the Hong Kong Police has done tremendous cases of crime to the Hong Kong people in the past months. Please stand with us to let justice shine on the Hong Kong soil once again.

What have they done to us since Jun 9 2019:
XXXX
XXXX

What should you do for us now:
1. Circulate the letter on your local LFC media page
2. Issue official statement by your local fans club
3. Demand the club and the player to response
4. Put pressure on your local MPs to press the UK government exercising practical sanction and punishment to the Communist government and Hong Kong Police
5. Organise protest to be shown on the home matches and go live.

Please action now to help the Hong Kong people who pursue for the universal values like yours. Save us from the massacre of Communist government and its counterparts. We will Never Walk Alone.

A group of LFC Supporters from Hong Kong
